text: The Marijuana Freedom and Opportunity Act is legislation that was introduced in the 115 and 116th U.S. Congresses to remove cannabis from the Controlled Substances Act and to establish a Marijuana Opportunity Trust Fund. The legislation is sponsored by U.S. Senate majority leader Chuck Schumer and Rep. Hakeem Jeffries.Top Democrats to Introduce Bill Removing Marijuana from Controlled Substances List U.S. News ==References== ==External link== *Senate Bill 1552 * Category:2019 cannabis law reform Category:Proposed legislation of the 115th United States Congress Category:Proposed legislation of the 116th United States Congress
title: Marijuana Freedom and Opportunity Act
